system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in.
system.descriptionText: The Sentry Stands watch across the battlefield, ready and waiting to deliver a hailfire of Lethal Rounds to any that dare to cross their firing line. Their mastery of rapid-fire heavy weaponry ensuring none survive uninjured.
system.effects:
Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Sentry. Apt: Ballistic Skill, Finesse, Intelligence, Perception, Offence, Toughness
Add. Equipment: Best Autogun, Best Heavy Stubber or Good Heavy Bolter or Common Multilaser. Gain Talents: Combat Sense+Weapon Training(Heavy) or Vigilant
Can Purchase Unique Talent: Unblinking Watcher and Basic Order: Hammering Storm
